body.name: DeerValley DV-1F52102 Ace One Piece Toilet, Dual Flush 1.1/1.6 GPF Elongated Toilet for Bathroom 12'' Rough-In Standard White Toilet with Comfortable Seat Height (Seat Included)
features: Luxurious Modern Design: Standard one piece toilet, with sleek look and top chrome button, perfectly suitable for your modern design bathroom.

Powerful & Quiet Flush: Siphonic Flushing, Dual Flush 1.1Gpf/1.6Gpf toilet can achieve MaP 1000 gram with our siphonic technology. Fully-glazed 2" trapway, bringing a super quiest and powerful flush with no clogs, no leaks and no problem.

Easy To Clean: With concealed trapway and completely smooth surface, one-piece construction toilets have no bends or corners to gather dust and easy to wipe down. Offering seamless look and easy cleaning.

Easily Installed: Two big installation access on the side allows the plumber to install this toilet much easier. The modern toilet comes with a supply line connector (adapter) for you to connect the supply line and toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", directly connect your water line to the toilet. If 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it.
All-In-One Package: Package includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, high-quality wax ring, floor bolts, and installation instruction.
Warranty: DeerValley toilets comes with lifetime after-sales service and 1 year limited warranty. 24 hours online. Feel free to contact us if you have any problems.
body.description: DeerValley 12'' Rough-In One Piece Toilet Luxurious Modern Design Standard one piece toilet perfectly suitable for every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The Dual-Flush feature is ideal for water conservation. DeerValley Toilet Questions & Answers: Q: What is the seat height? A: The seat height is 17 inches, toilets for bathrooms comfortable seat height. Q: What is the rough in? A: The toilet is standard 12 inch rough in toilet. Q:What should we do if received a broken or defective toilet? A:Feel free to contact DeerValley directly by email or cell and send the picture of the damaged toilet. We will reply to you within 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dual Flush Elongated One Piece Toilet with Soft Close Seat

DeerValley 12'' Rough-In One Piece Toilet Luxurious Modern Design Standard one piece toilet perfectly suitable for every modern bathroom. The seat-lid closes silently. The Dual-Flush feature is ideal for water conservation. DeerValley Toilet Questions & Answers: Q: What is the seat height? A: The seat height is 17 inches, toilets for bathrooms comfortable seat height. Q: What is the rough in? A: The toilet is standard 12 inch rough in toilet. Q:What should we do if received a broken or defective toilet? A:Feel free to contact DeerValley directly by email or cell and send the picture of the damaged toilet. We will reply to you within 24 hours. Toilet Features 12'' Rough-In Soft Close Seat Quick Release Seat Full-skirted Design Concealed Trapway Floor Mount Installation Dual flush Siphon System Tornado Flush

DeerValley High Quality One Piece Toilet Features Super Quiet & Powerful Flushing 2" fully glazed trapway, bringing a super-quiet and powerful flush-No clogs, No leaks. Highly efficient dual-flush 1.6 GPF /1.1GPF Quick-Release Soft Closing Seat The soft closing seat lid closes quietly and slowly. it also has a quick-release design, which is very easy to install and clean. Elongated Toilet Seat Elongated bowl can provide more space and make you more comfortable for long sitting.

One Piece Full Skirted Bowl Seamless side sector design bowl, concealed trapway offers seamless look and easy cleaning. Two big opening holes on the side to fix the toilet much easier. Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose The toilet comes with a supply line connector (adapter) for you to connect the supply line and toilet. If your supply line size is 1/2", directly connect your water line to the toilet. If 7/8", please screw off the adapter, then connect it. Please note the installation of the full-skirted toilet, according to the position of the water valve. All-In-One package Package Includes toilet, pre-installed soft closing toilet seat, pre-installed flush valve, chrome dual push-buttom, wax ring, floor bolts and installation instruction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This toilet is a must have edition for either your new bathroom or your existing bathroom. It's super easy to install and being it comes in one piece. It's not a bunch of take apart in assembly needed. It's very sturdy once assembled and secured in. And the best part is, it doesn't weigh a ton compared to a normal toilet. So that way, you're able to easily pick it up. My favorite part is a toilet seat because it easily disconnects so that way you're easily able to clean underneath it without having to take all the time to unscrew it or take it apart.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely designed and competitively priced.
reviews.reviewText: I love the one-piece construction, the straight sides, and the easily removable (by pushing a button) seat. It makes it so easy to clean! Another nice feature is the smooth surface under the rim, where most toilets have a very rough and unfinished surface. This toilet is slick there and cleans up very easy. Another nice touch is the button for the flush which uses less water eing smaller than the button for the big flush, which makes the choice intuitive, which is good for guests and people with a memory like mine. Other toilets that have the double flush sizes have no way to differentiate which button is which. One word of caution when purchasing is to be sure there is enough distance next to the toilet to the supply valve. The straight sides make this toilet wider than most. Mine barely fit, it was up against the valve so much I was lucky to get it installed. I highly recommend this toilet based on it's design!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fancy & modern style toilet with some nice features!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We keep replacing our toilet after a certain period of time and so got this. This product has overall good build quality & looks fancy in our bathroom. It is reasonably priced in competition & so would recommend these at this price point.My 2 cents below:Pros:- Good build quality of this seat- Both the flaps have a mechanism that closes down slowly and so does not slam them hard- Dual flush with 1.1/1.6 GPF water capacity- Comfortable to sit on as it has a 17" height- Quick release seat would make cleaning it convenient on a regular basis- Easy to install however I did get it done through a plumber- Sturdy and feels solid- Fixes very neatly and doesn't wobble while using- Comes well packed in a nice box as single piece unitCons:- None as this price factor & the features it offers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to install and it’s beautiful and sleek looking! I am very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful toilet but a pain to install
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful modern and power flushing toilet that is easy to clean. However, being a one piece toilet it was heavy to carry upstairs and even more difficult to install in a tight space like mine. Make sure you get a wax ring that can be reset with bolt guides or you'll have a heck of a time not breaking the wax seal trying to seat the toilet over the wax seal. Or just hire a plumber and avoid the hassle. I was able to install it after multiple attempts to set the toilet. Its hard because you cannot see the bolts because they are hidden inside the toilet and you can't have someone look for you because my space was too tight. It was hard to install but I did it and I'm very pleased with this quality modern toilet that will be so easy to keep clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, beautiful and stylish bathroom toilet
reviews.reviewText: First of all, the price is amazing compared to other in the market for this beautiful and stylish bathroom toilet. It works perfectly as intended. It is water efficient. It fits small bathrooms if you are concerned of the space, and it is very easy to keep it clean without too much effort. I really recommend this toilet if you are watching your budget but still want beautiful piece for your bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars PLEASE NOTE- WATER SUPPLY LINE MAY NEED TO BE REALIGNED BEFORE INSTALL.
reviews.reviewText: Please note that a typical water supply line,(coming from the wall), may need to be realigned or shortened in order to install this one-piece toilet. Moving a water supply line is not easy and can be very expensive. Also take into account the weight of a one-piece toilet if having to move up or down flights of stairs. I would consider the TOTO DRAKE TWO-PIECE elongated, dual-tornado flush instead. The Toto has a modern design with room for the standard water supply line coming from a wall. Most professionals recommend TOTO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great customer service
reviews.reviewText: Toilet is very sturdy and solid. Have to ask someone to help me install it. Although failed due to the water supply issue in my restroom, customer service provided great assistance to help me solve the issue.
